thread.title: Easybook Now Offering Maju Trans Marine Ferry Tickets Available at Reasonable Prices
thread.title_full: Easybook Now Offering Maju Trans Marine Ferry Tickets Available at Reasonable Prices

author: prbuzz.com
title: Easybook Now Offering Maju Trans Marine Ferry Tickets Available at Reasonable Prices
text:
Easybook recently launched their Maju Trans Marine Ferry tickets to add to Kuala Besut customers’ options when going to Perhentian Island. The company started offering the tickets on September 17, 2015. Along with the recent launch, Easybook also provides these tickets at reasonable prices to let customers have great savings.
The Perhentian Island is one of the top destinations by Kualu Besut locals and tourists during the peak season. One of the reasons that make it a popular destination is its stunning white-sand beaches and clear waters. The island is also filled with various water sports for visitors to enjoy and while their time during their stay. Among these water sports are scuba diving and snorkeling. Kayaking and jungle trekking activities are also offered.
Visitors who plan to the island always make sure to book for ferry tickets beforehand to ensure their transportation. Easybook is one of the most reliable booking sites where visitors can book for their tickets. Just recently, the company added Maju Trans Marine ferry tickets to their offers.
By booking a ferry ticket in advance at Easybook, customers gain a guaranteed transportation to the island. The ferry ride takes about 45 minutes before the island can be reached. Regular ferry departures are available to and from the Perhentian Island and Kualu Besut.
Customers interested to book for Maju Trans Marine Ferry Tickets may do so at Easybook . As one of the new partners of Easybook, Maju Trans Marine also offers the same service as the other partners the company has are known for. Easybook provides an easy way to book for tickets going to and from the island while the ferry operator guarantees a comfortable ride for the passengers. The Maju Trans Marine Ferry tickets are also offered by Easybook at great prices meant to let customers benefit from great savings.
Easybook is a company that started with providing a place where customers can easily book bus tickets going to Malaysia. It was founded by enterprising students in 2005. After several years, it now also caters to tickets for other means of transportation across Malaysia, Singapore, Taiwan, Brunei, Indonesia and Thailand. One of these is tickets for ferries with the Maju Trans Marine Holiday ferry tickets as one of the newest addition to their services.
Visit http://www.easybook.com/Pages_SGMY/news/maju-trans-marine.aspx to know more about Easybook’s newly launched holiday ferry tickets.
